languages.text: {n}Иногда вы чувствуете, как рядом с Кибеллой по спине пробегает холодок, и воздух наполняется едва заметными искрами. Похоже, ее силы проявляются лишь в гаданиях и моментах религиозной экзальтации, и она сама не осознает своего дара.{/n}

{n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иногда вы чувствуете, как рядом с Кибеллой по спине пробегает холодок, и воздух наполняется едва заметными искрами. Похоже, ее силы проявляются лишь в гаданиях и моментах религиозной экзальтации, и она сама не осознает своего дара.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sometimes when standing next to Kibellah, you sense a shiver run down your spine or detect faint sparks in the air. It seems her powers manifest themselves only when she is divining or in moments of pious exultation, and Kibellah herself is unaware of her gift.{/n}

{n}Sometimes when standing next to Kibellah, you sense a shiver run down your spine or detect faint sparks in the air. It seems her powers manifest themselves only when she is divining or in moments of pious exultation, and Kibellah herself is unaware of her gift.{/n}

{n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practicing divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

{n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practicing divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

{n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

{n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De vez en cuando notas un escalofrío que te recorre la espalda o detectas tenues chispas en el aire cuando estás junto a Kibellah. Parece que sus poderes solamente se manifiestan cuando practica sus artes adivinatorias o en instantes de exaltación religiosa. La propia Kibellah parece no ser consciente de su don.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De vez en cuando notas un escalofrío que te recorre la espalda o detectas tenues chispas en el aire cuando estás junto a Kibellah. Parece que sus poderes solamente se manifiestan cuando practica sus artes adivinatorias o en instantes de exaltación religiosa. La propia Kibellah parece no ser consciente de su don.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラの隣に立つと、時折背筋をぞくぞくしたものが走ったり、空気にかすかな火花が散るのを感じる。彼女の力が現れるのは、ディビネーションの修行をしているときか、信仰が高まっているときだけのようだ。キベラ自身は、自分の能力に気づいていないらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの隣に立つと、時折背筋をぞくぞくしたものが走ったり、空気にかすかな火花が散るのを感じる。彼女の力が現れるのは、ディビネーションの修行をしているときか、信仰が高まっているときだけのようだ。キベラ自身は、自分の能力に気づいていないらしい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你站在绮贝菈身边时，你偶尔会感到一阵战栗，察觉到空气中迸发着微弱的火花。看起来，她的力量只有在她占卜的时候，或是在虔诚的狂喜之中才会显现出来。绮贝菈本人似乎并没有意识到自己的天赋。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你站在绮贝菈身边时，你偶尔会感到一阵战栗，察觉到空气中迸发着微弱的火花。看起来，她的力量只有在她占卜的时候，或是在虔诚的狂喜之中才会显现出来。绮贝菈本人似乎并没有意识到自己的天赋。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst hin und wieder einen Schauer deine Wirbelsäule hinablaufen oder siehst winzige Funken in der Luft, wenn du neben Kibellah stehst. Ihre Kräfte scheinen sich nur bei Prophetien zu manifestieren, oder in Momenten andächtiger Ehrfurcht. Kibellah selbst scheint sich dieser Gabe nicht bewusst zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst hin und wieder einen Schauer deine Wirbelsäule hinablaufen oder siehst winzige Funken in der Luft, wenn du neben Kibellah stehst. Ihre Kräfte scheinen sich nur bei Prophetien zu manifestieren, oder in Momenten andächtiger Ehrfurcht. Kibellah selbst scheint sich dieser Gabe nicht bewusst zu sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand vous vous trouvez aux côtés de Kibellah, il vous arrive régulièrement de sentir un frisson vous parcourir l'échine ou de déceler des bribes d'électricité dans l'air. Apparemment, ses pouvoirs se manifestent uniquement lorsqu'elle pratique la divination, ou lors de ses accès d'extase mystique. Elle-même ne semble pas avoir conscience du don qui est le sien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand vous vous trouvez aux côtés de Kibellah, il vous arrive régulièrement de sentir un frisson vous parcourir l'échine ou de déceler des bribes d'électricité dans l'air. Apparemment, ses pouvoirs se manifestent uniquement lorsqu'elle pratique la divination, ou lors de ses accès d'extase mystique. Elle-même ne semble pas avoir conscience du don qui est le sien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zaman zaman Kibellah'nın yanında durduğunda tüylerin ürperiyor veya havada hafif kıvılcımlar seziyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa Kibellah'nın güçleri, kehanet ayini gerçekleştirirken ve dinî coşku anlarında ortaya çıkıyor. Kibellah ise bu yeteneğinin farkında değil gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You occasionally feel a shiver run down your spine, or detect faint sparks in the air when you are standing next to Kibellah. It seems her powers only manifest when she is practising divination, or in moments of pious exultation. Kibellah herself does not seem to be aware of her gift.{/n}
